meanings.definition: The day of the week designated for doing laundry.
meanings.sent1: On washday, Mom always does the laundry.
meanings.sent2: Saturday is our washday at home.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought washday was a great time to play with socks.
meanings.sent4: For the clothes, washday is like a refreshing spa day.
meanings.sent5: The sun shone brightly on washday, making the clothes smell fresh and clean.

meanings.definition: The act of washing clothes on a specific day.
meanings.sent1: I finished all the laundry on washday.
meanings.sent2: Her washday routine includes sorting, washing, and folding clothes.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped happily as she tackled the washday pile.
meanings.sent4: Washday turned into a dance party with the washing machine as the DJ.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the washing machine hummed softly on washday, creating a soothing rhythm.
